maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.cpp
/*

#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include <beastapi/beasttarget.h>
#include "beastwrappers/beastrenderpasswrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetentitywrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastuvlayerwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

void BeastTarget::addPass(BeastRenderPass& rp) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddPassToTarget(obj(), rp.obj()));
}

BeastTargetEntityPtr BeastTarget::addInstance(BeastInstance& instance) {
        ILBTargetEntityHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddBakeInstance(obj(), instance.obj(), &h));
        BeastTargetEntityPtr entity(new BeastTargetEntity(h));
        return entity;
}

void BeastTarget::setTargetResolution(int width, int height) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetTargetResolution(obj(), width, height));
}

void BeastTarget::setAtlasPadding(int padding) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetAtlasPadding(obj(), padding));
}

int BeastTarget::getFramebufferCount() {
        int32 nofBuffers;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetFramebufferCount(obj(), &nofBuffers));
        return nofBuffers;
}

BeastFramebufferPtr BeastTarget::getFrameBuffer(BeastRenderPass& rp, int index) {
        ILBFramebufferHandle fb;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetFramebuffer(obj(), rp.obj(), index, &fb));
        return BeastFramebufferPtr(new BeastFramebuffer(fb));
}

BeastFramebufferPtr BeastTarget::getVertexbuffer(BeastRenderPass& rp, BeastTargetEntity& te) {
        ILBFramebufferHandle buffer;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetVertexbuffer(obj(), rp.obj(), te.obj(), &buffer));
        BeastFramebufferPtr bufferPtr(new BeastFramebuffer(buffer));
        return bufferPtr;
}

beastmaya::BeastTargetEntityPtr BeastTarget::addMeshToTarget(BeastMesh& mesh) {
        ILBTargetEntityHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBAddMeshToTarget(obj(), mesh.obj(), &h));
        BeastTargetEntityPtr entity(new BeastTargetEntity(h));
        return entity;
}

beastmaya::BeastUVLayerPtr BeastTarget::getUVLayerFromTarget(BeastTargetEntity& targetEntity) {
        ILBUVLayerHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetUVLayerFromTarget(obj(), targetEntity.obj(), &h));
        BeastUVLayerPtr uvLayer(new BeastUVLayer(h));
        return uvLayer;
}

void BeastTarget::getUVLayerResolutionFromTarget(BeastTargetEntity& targetEntity, int& width, int& height) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetUVLayerResolutionFromTarget(obj(), targetEntity.obj(), &width, &height));
}

void BeastTarget::enableWorldSpaceFilter(ILBWorldSpaceFilterComponent component) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEnableWorldSpaceFilter(obj(), component));
}

void BeastTarget::setWorldSpaceFilterSize(ILBWorldSpaceFilterComponent component, float size) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetWorldSpaceFilterSize(obj(), component, size));
}

void BeastTarget::setWorldSpaceFilterNormalDeviation(ILBWorldSpaceFilterComponent component, float normalDeviation) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetWorldSpaceFilterNormalDeviation(obj(), component, normalDeviation));
}

}
Please send us your comment about this page
